attributes.action: Formally apoligise for not treating the Dalai Lama with the same respect of other significant foriegn visitors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Upon his 10 day visit Gordon Brown refused to greet the Dalai Lama at 10 Downing Street. Due likly to our governments fears of upsetting the Chinese government, we the undersigned reject such appeasement, and want to express our anger at a government that handpicks which vicious dictators it befriends, and which significant figures of peace in the world it choses to give less respect to.
    Gordon Brown should apoligise for his political pandering, or sheer lack of consideration, and set an example by giving time and respect in the offical manner to people who represent the qualities in humanity we all should be aspiring to.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
